text:
I use Jdk 1.4.1 beta on Win NT4.
If I click on a field in the table of the new User Parameter i have click a 
taste an then put the cursor with the mice in the same field if I want to use 
copy and paste per "Ctrl + v".
creator: jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com

text:
In JDK1.4.0, it's necessary to double-click in the field before pasting will
work (even though you can start typing into the field after simply selecting it
with one click).

Beyond that, I'm blaming the 1.4.1 beta.
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
